attributes.action: Abolish Council Tax in England and replace with a local sales tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Liberal Democrats came up with the policy of scrapping council tax and introducing a local income tax. My proposal is to take this idea one step further where a local sales tax would replace the Council tax. This would mean that if a family could afford to buy more they would have to pay more tax. This tax would save the local authorities court fees for non payers and all citizens would pay for their local amenities rather than just home owners. This proposal would benifit Pensioners, home owners and would hit the fat cats of the country.

rejection.details:
If you wish to resubmit suggest you: 

1) remove reference to political party and 
2) retitle e.g. 'Replace Council Tax with Sales Tax' to distinguish the proposal from existing 'abolish council tax' petitions.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
